title: Midnight 3D Watch Face
summary: Accessorize your smart watch with this fashionable and informative watch face!
description: Midnight 3D Watch Face is a canvas for strong lines and an elegant design.Features:- Gold accents over a black interface for style- 3 Dimensional textures for depth- 12/24 hour dials- Day-Date- Moon Phase displayWe've spent time to make this smart watch accessory both fashionable and informative. Experience a new dimension of time. Exclusively for your Android Wear.
descriptionHTML:
Midnight 3D Watch Face is a canvas for strong lines and an elegant design.

Features:

- Gold accents over a black interface for style

- 3 Dimensional textures for depth

- 12/24 hour dials

- Day-Date

- Moon Phase display

We've spent time to make this smart watch accessory both fashionable and informative. Experience a new dimension of time. Exclusively for your Android Wear.
comments: Nice watch face..... But It's too light. It looks more grayish than black. The indicators are not very accurate and even confusing.
Doesn't work on Moto360 I have reset both my phone and watch multiple times, and resynced Wear Apps to watch but it is still not listed in my watch face list. Uninstalling.
Disappointed Installed on moto 360 but it doesn't fill the face properly and looks like it's slipped from top to bottom!
Resolution I have the new Urbane and this has to be the worst resolution WatchFace I've ever seen
Just wow. Easily my new favorite watch face. Cant beat the look and the multiple dials.
Ambient mode is terrible The watch face itself looks great and works well. But ambient mode is really boring and ugly.
